user.title: Name Your Notify Service
user.description: Enter a human name (spaces OK); snake_case slug is auto-generated.

add_target.title: Select Notify Target
add_target.description: Choose an existing notify service to wrap.

add_condition.title: Define a Condition
add_condition.description: Pick any entity (sensor, binary_sensor, device_tracker, input_*), then operator/value.

match_mode.title: Condition Match Mode
match_mode.description: Match ALL conditions vs ANY one for this target.

condition_more.title: More Conditions?
condition_more.description: Add another condition or finish this target.

target_more.title: More Targets?
target_more.description: Add another notify target or finish.

choose_fallback.title: Fallback Service
choose_fallback.description: Select which notify service to use if none match.
